public void simplify()
Description copied from class: Email
Simplifies this email by removing duplicate pieces of information. The standard implementation removes duplicate recipient emails in the to, cc, and bcc sets.

Creates a mime message for an html emails with the following structure: mime/mixed - mime/alternative - text/plain - mime/related - text/html - image/* - image/* - (attachment mime type) - (attachment mime type)
